author: Philly.com Sports
title: Penn State football chat with Joe Juliano
text:
Sports Penn State football chat with Joe Juliano Join the Inquirer's Joe Juliano as he takes your Penn State football questions in a live chat, beginning Thursday at 1 p.m. Penn State football chat with Joe Juliano Philly.com Sports Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 11:44 PM 
Join the Inquirer 's Joe Juliano as he takes your Penn State football questions in a live chat, beginning Thursday at 1 p.m. More coverage Previous Story: Fantasy football chat with Ed Barkowitz About this blog Joe Juliano has been a staff writer for The Inquirer for 30 years, covering covering Penn State football, Villanova basketball and other college sports, along with golf and the Penn Relays. This is his seventh season on The Inquirerâ€™s Penn State beat. He previously covered the Nittany Lions for United Press International from 1976-84. Joining Joe this season will be Erin McCarthy , an intern for The Inquirer and a junior at Penn State majoring in print and digital journalism. This is Erin's first season on the Penn State football beat. She previously spent two summers as an Inquirer summer intern on the Pennsylvania and South Jersey desks. She is also an editor for the Daily Collegian, the university's student newspaper. A Delaware County native, Erin graduated from Episcopal Academy. Joe Juliano Inquirer Staff Writer Twitter | Email Get our top stories
